alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washtenaw County through 615 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chelsea, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chelsea around 525 PM EDT. Dexter around 545 PM EDT. Ann Arbor around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hudson Mills, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
